faqs.question: What career opportunities are available after completing BBA in Operations Management?
faqs.answer: Graduates can pursue roles like Operations Coordinator, Supply Chain Analyst, Business Consultant, and Procurement Specialist in various industries including manufacturing, retail, logistics, and consulting.

faqs.question: Is this program suitable for students without a business background?
faqs.answer: Yes, the program is designed to provide a comprehensive foundation in business operations. Our curriculum includes foundational courses that help students from diverse academic backgrounds understand core business concepts.

faqs.question: What makes this BBA program unique?
faqs.answer: Our program focuses on practical, industry-relevant skills, includes hands-on projects, provides industry certifications, and offers mentorship from experienced professionals in operations management.

faqs.question: Are there internship opportunities during the course?
faqs.answer: Yes, we have tie-ups with leading companies that provide internship opportunities for our students, allowing them to gain real-world experience and build professional networks.

faqs.question: What is the duration of the BBA in Operations Management program?
faqs.answer: The program is a 3-year full-time undergraduate degree, divided into 6 semesters, with a comprehensive curriculum covering various aspects of business operations.

faqs.question: Are the online degree programs offered by UPES Online recognized and approved?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. All online degree programs provided by UPES Online hold recognition and approval from the University Grants Commission (UGC) and the Distance Education Bureau (DEB). This ensures that the education you receive meets the highest quality standards.Please refer to https://deb.ugc.ac.in for further information.

faqs.question: How does UPES Online fare in terms of rankings?
faqs.answer: UPES Online's commitment to excellence is underscored by its remarkable achievements. We are not only ranked 39th in the Management category of the National Institutional Ranking Framework (NIRF), but UPES as a whole is also the No.1 Private University in Academic Reputation. Furthermore, our university ranks amongst the top 3% of universities worldwide, as per the 2024 QS World University Rankings.

faqs.question: Are UPES Online's degrees globally accepted?
faqs.answer: Yes, indeed. UPES Online's degrees carry international recognition. Organizations like World Education Services (WES) acknowledge and accept our degrees, facilitating opportunities in regions such as the US and Canada.

faqs.question: What variety of programs does UPES Online offer?
faqs.answer: UPES Online boasts a diverse array of online degree programs and professional certifications across 32 disciplines. Whether your interest lies in business, engineering, technology, or other fields, we have options to cater to your aspirations.

faqs.question: How credible are UPES Online's degrees in the industry?
faqs.answer: UPES Online's degrees and certificates hold significant credibility and value in the eyes of various stakeholders, including government agencies, corporations, and educational institutions. This recognition expands your horizons for career growth.Choose UPES Online with confidence, knowing that our recognized online programs, impressive rankings, global acceptance, and international acclaim can propel you toward academic and professional success. For more detailed information, feel free to explore our official website or contact our admissions team.

faqs.question: Will this degree be valid/recognized outside India?
faqs.answer: Yes, our online degrees are recognized in India and abroad. Our alumni have undertaken further studies and made successful careers after completing these programmes, in many countries across the globe.

faqs.question: Do you offer any placement assistance?
faqs.answer: Absolutely, we go beyond the traditional placement support. We offer comprehensive career orientation sessions, enabling you to explore various career paths and gain clarity on your aspirations. Crafting an impactful resume is a crucial step, and we provide assistance in creating an outstanding one. Not only that, our expert guidance extends to helping you build an impressive LinkedIn profile, enhancing your online professional presence. We also share relevant supply chain management job offers every month, ensuring you have a consistent stream of opportunities aligning with your envisioned career path.

faqs.question: Why should I choose your online program?
faqs.answer: Legacy University: Ranked 46 among Indian universities and 41 in the management category by NIRF 2024. QS 5-star for academic development. NAAC 'A' Grade University.Dual Certification: From prestigious global universities like Rutgers, Wharton Online, and more.Convenient Financing: Low-interest loans and flexible part-payments available.Enriching Learning Journey: Exclusive Pre-Semester specialized courses, workshops, and masterclasses by global faculty.Career Support: Resume building, LinkedIn guidance, virtual apprenticeships, and regular job opportunity updates.Interactive Learning: Engage with dynamic and interactive study material.Case study-based pedagogy: Enhance your problem-solving skills using AI and other real-world solutions.Dedicated student support: Get prompt assistance for all your queries.

faqs.question: Is this program suitable for students without an operations background?
faqs.answer: Yes, the program is designed to provide a comprehensive foundation in operations management. Our curriculum includes foundational courses that help students from diverse academic backgrounds understand core operations concepts.

faqs.question: What makes this MBA program unique?
faqs.answer: Our program focuses on practical, industry-relevant skills, includes hands-on projects, provides industry certifications, and offers mentorship from experienced professionals in operations management.

faqs.question: Are there internship opportunities during the course?
faqs.answer: Yes, we have tie-ups with leading companies that provide internship opportunities for our students, allowing them to gain real-world experience and build professional networks.

faqs.question: What is the duration of the MBA in Operations Management program?
faqs.answer: The program is a 2-year full-time postgraduate degree, divided into 4 semesters, with a comprehensive curriculum covering various aspects of operations management.

faqs.question: What career opportunities are available after completing BBA in Operations Management?
faqs.answer: Graduates can pursue roles like Operations Coordinator, Supply Chain Analyst, Business Consultant, and Procurement Specialist in various industries including manufacturing, retail, logistics, and consulting.

faqs.question: Is this program suitable for students without a business background?
faqs.answer: Yes, the program is designed to provide a comprehensive foundation in business operations. Our curriculum includes foundational courses that help students from diverse academic backgrounds understand core business concepts.

faqs.question: What makes this BBA program unique?
faqs.answer: Our program focuses on practical, industry-relevant skills, includes hands-on projects, provides industry certifications, and offers mentorship from experienced professionals in operations management.

faqs.question: Are there internship opportunities during the course?
faqs.answer: Yes, we have tie-ups with leading companies that provide internship opportunities for our students, allowing them to gain real-world experience and build professional networks.

faqs.question: What is the duration of the BBA in Operations Management program?
faqs.answer: The program is a 3-year full-time undergraduate degree, divided into 6 semesters, with a comprehensive curriculum covering various aspects of business operations.
